Package be.projet3.toutouapp.controllers

Class RatingController

java.lang.Object
be.projet3.toutouapp.controllers.RatingController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/rating") public class RatingController extends Object
Controller for managing ratings in the application. This class provides the endpoints for interacting with ratings, including retrieving, creating, and deleting ratings, as well as retrieving negative ratings with detailed information.
Author:
Amico Matteo

  • Constructor Details

      public RatingController()

  • Method Details

    • getAllRatings

      @GetMapping public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<Rating>> getAllRatings()
      Retrieves all ratings. This endpoint returns a list of all ratings with HTTP status 200 OK.
      Returns:
      A ResponseEntity containing the list of ratings and HTTP status 200.

    • getRatingBuUserId

      @GetMapping("/user/{userId}") public List<Rating> getRatingBuUserId(@PathVariable int userId)
      Retrieves all ratings for a specific user. This endpoint returns a list of ratings associated with the specified user ID.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user whose ratings are to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      A list of ratings for the specified user.

    • deleteRating

      @DeleteMapping("/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Void> deleteRating(@PathVariable int id)
      Deletes a rating by its ID. This endpoint deletes the rating identified by the provided ID and returns HTTP 204 No Content status.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the rating to be deleted.
      Returns:
      A ResponseEntity with HTTP status 204 (No Content).

    • addRating

      @PostMapping public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Rating> addRating(@RequestBody Rating rating)
      Adds a new rating. This endpoint creates a new rating and returns the created rating with HTTP status 201 Created.
      Parameters:
      rating - The rating to be added.
      Returns:
      A ResponseEntity containing the newly created rating and HTTP status 201.

    • getNegativeRatings

      @GetMapping("/negative") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<RatingInfoDTO>> getNegativeRatings()
      Retrieves all negative ratings with detailed information. This endpoint returns only negative ratings, with additional details like evaluated user, rater user, and request information.
      Returns:
      A ResponseEntity containing the list of negative ratings with detailed information.
